page.title: 09RESIDENT INTERVIEW
page.content: Mr.Paulson has lived in the area for seventy years,and his family have lived here for about a thousand. The area has obviously changed a lot in that seventy years. He says that the biggest change he has noticed has been the large increase in the building of houses. The area has changed into a small number of communities, i.e. Rowsley, Darley Dale etc, rather than lots of different groups of houses. Mr. Paulson thinks that the area is too built up and said, "There are far too many strangers and that there ought to be more comunity facilities than there are now". As a child he went to Churchtown School, Darley Dale, and then to the Earnest Bailey Grammar School, Matlock. He knows a great deal about the area, both past and present.
